availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Maphet (Newport, Kentucky, clerk and insurance agent.)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, clerk and insurance agent. Newport, Kentucky, native. Married to Emily Shattuch Maphet. Father of Josephine Maphet, John Maphet, William H. Maphet, Douglass Maphet, and Anna Maphet. Carpenter in Newport, Kentucky, in 1850. Insurance agent in Newport in 1860. Unsuccessful applicant for the post of paymaster of Newport in 1862. Clerk in Newport in 1863.

ab.bibl:
